an4.6:1.3: Appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno, bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno.
an4.6:1.4: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:1.6: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:1.7: So tassa appakassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:1.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appakaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:2.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:2.4: So tassa appakassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:2.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno?
an4.6:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:3.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:3.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:3.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno.
an4.6:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno?
an4.6:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahukaṃ sutaṃ hoti—
an4.6:4.3: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ.
an4.6:4.4: So tassa bahukassa sutassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti.
an4.6:4.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno.
an4.6:4.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasminti.
